en: Tom's way of speaking got on my nerves.
zh: 汤姆说话的方式让我很恼火。

en: Tom's friends called him Mr Money Bags.
zh: 汤姆的朋友们叫他“钱袋子先生”。

en: Tom's hope was to win first prize.
zh: 汤姆的希望是赢得一等奖。

en: Tom's report leaves much to be desired.
zh: 汤姆的报告有很多不足之处。

en: Tom's Japanese is improving little by little.
zh: 汤姆的日语正在一点一点地进步。

en: Tom's anger blazed out suddenly.
zh: 汤姆的怒火突然爆发了。

en: We'll have to take on someone to do Tom's work.
zh: 我们得找个人来接替汤姆的工作。

en: We are giving Tom a birthday party.
zh: 我们正在为汤姆举办生日派对。

en: Let's get up a party for Tom's birthday.
zh: 我们为汤姆的生日举办一个派对吧。

en: All but Tom were present.
zh: 除了汤姆，所有人都到了。

en: Tom's hobby is collecting photos of cars.
zh: 汤姆的爱好是收集汽车照片。

en: Where is Tom's classroom?
zh: 汤姆的教室在哪里？

en: Tom's speech was excellent.
zh: 汤姆的演讲非常精彩。

en: A good student like Tom brings honor to our class.
zh: 像汤姆这样的好学生为我们班争光。

en: Let's give Tom a surprise welcome party.
zh: 我们给汤姆举办一个惊喜欢迎派对吧。

en: Tom's grandmother looks healthy.
zh: 汤姆的奶奶看起来很健康。

en: Tom's uncle keeps a lot of sheep.
zh: 汤姆的叔叔养了很多羊。

en: I had to run to catch up with Tom.
zh: 我不得不跑着才能赶上汤姆。

en: I got Tom to mend my shoes.
zh: 我让汤姆帮我修鞋。

en: I might as well throw my money into the sea as lend it to Tom.
zh: 我把钱借给汤姆，还不如扔到海里。

en: According to Tom, Jane got married last month.
zh: 根据汤姆所说，简上个月结婚了。

en: Tom has many talents.
zh: 汤姆有很多才能。

en: It is Tom's ambition to go to the moon.
zh: 汤姆的志向是去月球。

en: Tom and I are friends.
zh: 汤姆和我 是朋友。

en: Tom and my secret came to light.
zh: 汤姆和我的秘密被揭穿了。

en: Tom and I have nothing in common.
zh: 我和汤姆没有任何共同之处。

en: Tom and I are good friends.
zh: 我和汤姆是好朋友。

en: If you go drinking with Tom, be prepared to listen to some pretty outlandish cock and bull stories.
zh: 如果你和汤姆一起喝酒，要准备好听一些非常离奇的胡说八道的故事。

en: Tom is engaged to Ruth.
zh: 汤姆和露丝订婚了。

en: Tom and Mike became acquainted through their mutual friends.
zh: 汤姆和迈克通过共同的朋友认识了。

en: Tom and Frank are good friends.
zh: 汤姆和弗兰克是好朋友。

en: Tom and Bill arrived at the conclusion independently of each other.
zh: 汤姆和比尔各自独立地得出了结论。

en: I am on speaking terms with Tom.
zh: 我和汤姆保持着可以说话的关系。

en: I advise you not to keep company with Tom.
zh: 我建议你不要和汤姆交往。

en: Tom and Sue love each other.
zh: 汤姆和苏彼此相爱。

en: Tom and Nancy broke up last month.
zh: 汤姆和南希上个月分手了。

en: Tom and Sue have known each other since 1985.
zh: 汤姆和苏自1985年以来就认识了。

en: Tom and John are good friends.
zh: 汤姆和约翰是好朋友。

en: Tom and Jim have been on bad terms for many years.
zh: 汤姆和吉姆多年来关系一直不好。

en: Tom is as tall as Jim.
zh: 汤姆和吉姆一样高。

en: Tom and Jane got married last month.
zh: 汤姆和简上个月结婚了。

en: Tom and Jane quarreled, but they made up the next morning.
zh: 汤姆和简吵架了，但第二天早上他们和好了。

en: Will you go with Tom?
zh: 你和汤姆一起去吗？

en: Have you ever heard of a poet by the name of Tom?
zh: 你听说过一位名叫汤姆的诗人吗？

en: Aren't you Tom?
zh: 你不是汤姆吗？

en: It's none other than Tom!
zh: 不是别人，正是汤姆！

en: Tom's wife keeps him on such a short rope.
zh: 汤姆的妻子管他管得很严。

en: It's not just Tom that has to study. I have to study, too.
zh: 不只是汤姆要学习。我也要学习。

en: I borrowed money not only from Tom, but from his wife, too.
zh: 我不仅向汤姆借了钱，还向他的妻子借了钱。

en: Tom was singled out for praise.
zh: 汤姆被单独表扬了。

en: Please give my best regards to Tom.
zh: 请代我向汤姆问好。

en: It was at Oxford University that Tom studied history.
zh: 汤姆是在牛津大学学习的历史。

en: Tom got first prize, didn't he?
zh: 汤姆得了第一名，不是吗？

en: Do not interfere with Tom while he is reading.
zh: 汤姆看书的时候，请不要打扰他。

en: Don't interfere with Tom while he is reading.
zh: 汤姆看书的时候，别打扰他。

en: I wish Tom were my younger brother.
zh: 我希望汤姆是我的弟弟。

en: There is little, if any, hope that Tom will win the election.
zh: 汤姆赢得选举的希望渺茫，即使有，也很小。

en: It was yesterday that Tom broke the window.
zh: 汤姆是昨天打破窗户的。

en: I heard Tom snoring during the class.
zh: 我听到汤姆上课时打鼾。

en: Can you envisage Tom's working in a garage?
zh: 你能想象汤姆在车库工作吗？

en: Tom is the on-deck batter.
zh: 汤姆是下一个击球手。

en: I expect that Tom will pass the exam.
zh: 我期望汤姆能通过考试。

en: It was a pity that Tom couldn't come to our party.
zh: 汤姆不能来参加我们的聚会，真是太可惜了。

en: Tom found me a taxi.
zh: 汤姆帮我叫了辆出租车。

en: Either Tom or I must go.
zh: 要么汤姆去，要么我去。

en: It was the window that Tom broke yesterday.
zh: 汤姆昨天打破的是窗户。

en: When Tom lost his wallet, he was out of luck.
zh: 汤姆丢了钱包，真倒霉。

en: Tom owes what he is today to his wife.
zh: 汤姆今天所拥有的一切都归功于他的妻子。

en: Tom is at the door. Please ask him in.
zh: 汤姆在门口。请让他进来。

en: I've heard of Tom's marriage to a rich woman.
zh: 我听说汤姆和一位富婆结婚了。

en: I'm going to talk to Tom when he returns home.
zh: 汤姆回家后，我打算和他谈谈。

en: Never did I dream of hearing from Tom.
zh: 我做梦也没想到会收到汤姆的消息。

en: Tom ran and ran, until at last he saw the telephone booth.
zh: 汤姆不停地跑啊跑，直到最后他看到了电话亭。

en: No sooner had Tom turned on the TV than the fuse blew.
zh: 汤姆刚打开电视，保险丝就烧断了。

en: Tom leads the soccer team.
zh: 汤姆是足球队的队长。

en: When Tom told Chris he didn't like her scarf, she got rid of it.
zh: 当汤姆告诉克里斯他不喜欢她的围巾时，她就把围巾扔掉了。

en: Who will fill in for Tom when he is away?
zh: 汤姆不在的时候谁来代替他？

en: Uncle Tom is my mother's brother.
zh: 汤姆叔叔是我妈妈的哥哥。

en: What a good boy you are, Tom!
zh: 你真是个好孩子，汤姆！

en: Tom Skeleton was shaking and trembling in every limb.
zh: 汤姆·斯凯尔顿浑身颤抖。

en: Mr Tom Jones has agreed to serve as the project leader for this new work item.
zh: 汤姆·琼斯先生已经同意担任这个新工作项目的项目负责人。

en: "Sit down, Tom." "All right."
zh: “坐下，汤姆。”“好的。”

en: Stand up and read the book, Tom.
zh: 站起来读这本书，汤姆。

en: Tom, what would you like to have for dinner?
zh: 汤姆，你晚餐想吃什么？

en: I'm going to have you read the letter to me, Tom.
zh: 我要你把这封信读给我听，汤姆。

en: You look after the children, Tom.
zh: 你照顾孩子们，汤姆。

en: How nice to see you again, Tom.
zh: 很高兴再次见到你，汤姆。

en: Give me your passport, Tom. I'll keep it in my safe.
zh: 把你的护照给我，汤姆。我会把它放在我的保险箱里。

en: How are you, Tom?
zh: 你好吗，汤姆？

en: Tommy did not want to run the risk of losing his job.
zh: 汤米不想冒失去工作的风险。

en: Tommy is a nice man.
zh: 汤米是个好人。

en: Tommy couldn't answer the last question.
zh: 汤米回答不出最后一个问题。

en: Tommy, can you hear me?
zh: 汤米，你能听到我说话吗？

en: The tomato is a vegetable, not a fruit.
zh: 西红柿是一种蔬菜，不是水果。

en: The tomato is subject to a number of diseases.
zh: 西红柿容易患多种疾病。

en: Is a tomato a fruit or a vegetable?
zh: 西红柿是水果还是蔬菜？

en: Tomatoes are sold by the pound.
zh: 西红柿是按磅出售的。

en: Miss Thomas teaches us history.
zh: 托马斯小姐教我们历史。

en: I'll have tomato and onion.
zh: 我要西红柿和洋葱。

en: Thomas was named after his father.
zh: 托马斯是以他父亲的名字命名的。

en: Thomas Edison invented the light bulb.
zh: 托马斯·爱迪生发明了电灯泡。

en: All the stories are interesting.
zh: 所有的故事都很有趣。

en: "Which line should I get in?" "Any line is fine."
zh: “我应该排哪条队？”“哪条队都可以。”

en: There's a black sheep in every flock.
zh: 每个群体里都有害群之马。

en: Every nation has its own myths.
zh: 每个民族都有自己的神话。

en: No book is worth reading.
zh: 没有哪本书值得一读。

en: Where is the fat located?
zh: 脂肪位于哪里？

en: Which beautician would you like?
zh: 您想要哪位美容师为您服务？

en: They have all been through wind tests.
zh: 他们都经历过风洞试验。

en: Whichever road you may take, it will lead to the station.
zh: 无论你走哪条路，都会到达车站。

en: I hesitated about which road to take.
zh: 我犹豫该走哪条路。

en: You should be prudent in deciding which way to go.
zh: 你在决定走哪条路时应该谨慎。

en: Whatever course you may take, you must do your best.
zh: 无论你选择什么道路，你都必须尽力而为。

en: The climate affects people in every land.
zh: 气候影响着每个地方的人们。

en: But every train is so crowded that whatever we have in our hands doesn't fall even if we let it go.
zh: 但是每趟列车都非常拥挤，以至于我们手中的东西即使松手也不会掉落。

en: The trains were jammed with commuters.
zh: 火车上挤满了通勤者。

en: Which train takes us to Kamakura?
zh: 哪趟火车能带我们去镰仓？

en: Which train are you catching?
zh: 你赶哪趟火车？

en: I didn't know for certain which train to take.
zh: 我不确定该坐哪趟火车。

en: How formal is this ceremony?
zh: 这个典礼有多正式？

en: What train goes to the center of town?
zh: 哪趟火车去市中心？

en: How much do you believe him?
zh: 你有多相信他？

en: To what extent can he be trusted?
zh: 他有多大程度上可以被信任？

en: I have no idea to what extent I can trust them.
zh: 我不知道我能在多大程度上信任他们。

en: To what extent was the report true?
zh: 这份报告在多大程度上是真实的？

en: What subway goes to the center of town?
zh: 哪条地铁线路能到市中心？

en: Ask whichever of the boys you see first.
zh: 你先看到哪个男孩就问哪个。

en: Sales have dropped off at every big department store.
zh: 各大百货商店的销售额都在下降。

en: It matters very little what college you graduated from.
zh: 你从哪所大学毕业关系不大。

en: I had some difficulty making up my mind which colleges to apply to.
zh: 我在决定申请哪些大学时遇到了一些困难。

en: He will have determined which college he wants to go to.
zh: 他会确定他想去哪所大学。

en: I'm thinking about which college might be best for me.
zh: 我正在考虑哪所大学可能最适合我。

en: Every teacher does their best.
zh: 每位老师都尽力而为。

en: Can you please tell me why there seem to be two churches in every village?
zh: 你能告诉我为什么每个村庄似乎都有两座教堂吗？

en: Any seat will do.
zh: 随便哪个座位都可以。

en: Every seat was full.
zh: 每个座位都满了。

en: None of the teachers could solve the problem.
zh: 没有一位老师能解决这个问题。

en: Every student was asked his or her name and birthplace.
zh: 每个学生都被问了他的名字和出生地。

en: Each student has a locker.
zh: 每个学生都有一个储物柜。

en: Every student knows the school song.
zh: 每个学生都会唱校歌。

en: Every pupil was asked one question.
zh: 每个学生都被问了一个问题。

en: Every student has to leave school by six.
zh: 每个学生都必须在六点前离开学校。

en: Whichever way we choose will involve danger.
zh: 我们选择哪条路都会有危险。

en: Any paper you read will tell the same story.
zh: 你读的任何报纸都会告诉你同样的故事。

en: His courage was celebrated in all the newspapers.
zh: 他的勇气在所有报纸上都得到了赞扬。

en: A full description of him has been circulated in every newspaper.
zh: 关于他的详细描述已在每份报纸上发布。

en: Every boss has his or her favorite employee.
zh: 每个老板都有他或她最喜欢的员工。

en: Every boy and girl knows him.
zh: 每个男孩和女孩都认识他。

en: Each and every boy has gone to see the game.
zh: 每个男孩都去看比赛了。

en: Each boy has a bike.
zh: 每个男孩都有一辆自行车。

en: Every boy and every girl was delighted.
zh: 每个男孩和每个女孩都很高兴。

en: Every girl knows that singer.
zh: 每个女孩都认识那个歌手。

en: Every woman was shocked at the sight.
zh: 每个女人都被眼前的景象震惊了。

en: Each of the girls was dressed neatly.
zh: 每个女孩都穿得很整洁。

en: Every girl cannot be a ballerina.
zh: 不是每个女孩都能成为芭蕾舞演员。

en: Which car is less crowded?
zh: 哪辆车不那么拥挤？

en: We all must abide by laws to live in any society.
zh: 我们所有人都必须遵守法律才能在任何社会中生活。

en: We all abide by law to live in any society.
zh: 我们所有人都遵守法律才能在任何社会中生活。

en: Can you recommend a good play?
zh: 你能推荐一个好剧吗？

en: Which dictionary did you refer to?
zh: 你参考了哪个词典？

en: Which dictionary do you often use?
zh: 你经常用哪个词典？

en: Where does it hurt?
zh: 哪里疼？

en: Not all children like apples.
zh: 不是所有孩子都喜欢苹果。

en: All children do not like apples.
zh: 所有孩子都不喜欢苹果。

en: No work can be done with ease.
zh: 没有工作可以轻松完成。

en: Every child bowed to the teacher.
zh: 每个孩子都向老师鞠躬。

en: I haven't decided which job to apply for.
zh: 我还没决定申请哪个工作。

en: Every country has its own history.
zh: 每个国家都有自己的历史。

en: Every country has its national flag.
zh: 每个国家都有自己的国旗。

en: Which dog is yours?
zh: 哪只狗是你的？

en: Which shoes are you going to put on?
zh: 你打算穿哪双鞋？

en: Which airport do I leave from?
zh: 我从哪个机场出发？

en: What subject are you poor at?
zh: 你哪门功课不好？

en: What subject are you good at?
zh: 你哪门功课好？

en: Which subject do you like best?
zh: 你最喜欢哪门功课？

en: There is an exception to every rule.
zh: 每个规则都有例外。

en: Every reporter sent his stories with the least possible delay.
zh: 每个记者都以尽可能最短的时间发送了他的报道。

en: What season do you like the best?
zh: 你最喜欢哪个季节？

en: Every government office seems to have problems in expediting matters without entanglement in its red tape system.
zh: 每个政府部门似乎都有在不陷入繁文缛节的情况下加快处理事务的问题。

en: Every student passed the driving test.
zh: 每个学生都通过了驾驶考试。

en: What school a person graduated from counts for nothing.
zh: 一个人从什么学校毕业的并不重要。

en: What fruit do you like the best?
zh: 你最喜欢什么水果？

en: Please advise me which subject I should choose.
zh: 请您建议我应该选择哪个科目。

en: I like English best of all subjects.
zh: 在所有科目中，我最喜欢英语。

en: Every family has a skeleton in the closet.
zh: 每个家庭都有不可告人的秘密。

en: Which house did you live in?
zh: 你住在哪个房子里？

en: Every house had a garden.
zh: 每栋房子都有一个花园。

en: How soon will the meeting begin?
zh: 会议什么时候开始？

en: How do you want them?
zh: 你想要他们怎么样？

en: He explained how the accident came about.
zh: 他解释了事故是如何发生的。

en: How can I get to the police station?
zh: 我怎么去警察局？

en: How shall we deal with this problem?
zh: 我们应该如何处理这个问题？

en: How did you get to know her?
zh: 你是怎么认识她的？

en: How did you get to know about her?
zh: 你是怎么知道她的？

en: How are you getting along?
zh: 你最近怎么样？

en: How do you think I learned to speak English?
zh: 你认为我是怎么学会说英语的？

en: How did you come by an admission ticket for the auto show free of charge?
zh: 你是怎么免费得到车展的入场券的？

en: Can you tell me how to get to Hyde Park?
zh: 你能告诉我怎么去海德公园吗？

en: How did the car accident come about?
zh: 车祸是怎么发生的？

en: How do you happen to know Mr Slater?
zh: 你怎么会认识斯莱特先生？

en: How did you figure out this problem?
zh: 你是怎么解决这个问题的？

en: How did you arrive at this conclusion?
zh: 你是怎么得出这个结论的？

en: How did you come here?
zh: 你怎么来的？

en: How can you tell an Englishman from an American?
zh: 你如何区分英国人和美国人？

en: How do you want your hair cut?
zh: 你想怎么剪头发？

en: What would you like to be called?
zh: 你想被称为什么？/你想怎么称呼你？

en: How are you getting along with your study?
zh: 你的学习进展如何？

en: How did you embody your idea?
zh: 你是如何体现你的想法的？

en: What are the symptoms?
zh: 有什么症状？

en: Please inform me what options are available to me.
zh: 请告诉我有哪些选择。

en: Half the fun of giving and receiving presents at any party is to see and talk about what everyone else brought.
zh: 在任何聚会上，赠送和接受礼物的乐趣有一半在于观看和谈论其他人带来了什么。

en: I would appreciate any information you can send to us.
zh: 如果您能向我们发送任何信息，我将不胜感激。

en: What payment options are available?
zh: 有哪些付款方式？

en: You can always count on him in any emergency.
zh: 在任何紧急情况下，你都可以指望他。

en: What sports do you go in for?
zh: 你喜欢什么运动？

en: I don't know which button to push.
zh: 我不知道该按哪个按钮。

en: Which platform is it on?
zh: 在哪个平台上？

en: Every bus is full.
zh: 每辆公交车都满了。

en: Life has its sorrows, as every rose has its thorns.
zh: 人生不如意事十之八九，正如玫瑰带刺。

en: Could you tell me which bus or train goes to the center of the town?
zh: 请问哪辆公交车或火车去市中心？

en: She wondered which door to open.
zh: 她想知道该打开哪扇门。

en: Every team was defeated without exception.
zh: 每个团队都无一例外地被击败了。

en: Which is your favorite team?
zh: 你最喜欢的球队是哪个？

en: Which team will win?
zh: 哪个队会赢？

en: Which team is the most likely to win the championship?
zh: 哪个队最有可能赢得冠军？

en: What sport do you like best?
zh: 你最喜欢什么运动？

en: Which skirt do you like?

en: Corn is an important crop in the United States.
zh: 玉米是美国的重要农作物。

en: Something is wrong with this word processor.
zh: 这个文字处理器出问题了。

en: That's very kind of you.
zh: 你真好。

en: It seems that something is wrong with the computer.
zh: 看来电脑出问题了。

en: That is a fine excuse.
zh: 这真是个好借口。

en: I feel that I don't really belong here.
zh: 我觉得我不太属于这里。

en: Hi, I'm Taro Kawaguchi.
zh: 你好，我是河口太郎。

en: Something seems to be wrong with my stomach.
zh: 我觉得我的胃有点不舒服。

en: I'm just looking, thank you.
zh: 我只是看看，谢谢。

en: I'm not too clear about that point.
zh: 我对那一点不太清楚。

en: This will do for the time being.
zh: 目前这样就行了。

en: We gained access to the house through the window.
zh: 我们通过窗户进入了房子。

en: I managed to make the teacher understand my idea.
zh: 我设法让老师理解了我的想法。

en: I managed to finish the book.
zh: 我设法读完了这本书。

en: Can you possibly help me?
zh: 你能帮我一下吗？

en: I need to get there soon by any means.
zh: 我需要尽快到达那里，无论如何。

en: I can play the piano after a fashion.
zh: 我勉强会弹钢琴。

en: At last, she hit on a good idea.
zh: 最后，她想到了一个好主意。

en: After all she did not come.
zh: 结果她还是没来。

en: At last she got a job as a stewardess.
zh: 最后她找到了一份空姐的工作。

en: Finally the children saw a little orchard in the middle of the mountain with apple trees growing inside it.
zh: 最后，孩子们在山中央看到一个小果园，里面种着苹果树。

en: Finally they gave in to their enemy.
zh: 最后他们向敌人屈服了。

en: At last he unfolded his plans for their future.
zh: 他终于展开了他对他们未来的计划。

en: He was put to death finally.
zh: 他最终被处决了。

en: At last he could finish the work.
zh: 他终于可以完成这项工作了。

en: At last he appeared.
zh: 他终于出现了。

en: It seems that the rainy season is over at last.
zh: 看来雨季终于结束了。

en: We have been completely cornered.
zh: 我们已经完全被逼到绝境了。

en: At last, the truth was revealed to us.
zh: 真相终于向我们揭示了。

en: I have finally finished my homework; now I can go to bed.
zh: 我终于完成了作业；现在我可以睡觉了。

en: At length, we reached the top of the mountain.
zh: 最终，我们到达了山顶。

en: At last, we succeeded in solving the question.
zh: 最后，我们成功地解决了这个问题。

en: At length, my wish was realized.
zh: 最终，我的愿望实现了。

en: Finally, my sister got engaged.
zh: 最终，我姐姐订婚了。

en: Finally, my sister got married.
zh: 最终，我姐姐结婚了。

en: At last we can afford a house.
zh: 我们终于买得起房子了。

en: We finally got rid of our old car.
zh: 我们终于摆脱了我们的旧车。

en: At last, we reached California.
zh: 最终，我们到达了加利福尼亚。

en: At last, the day has arrived for us to act.
zh: 终于，我们采取行动的日子到来了。

en: Summer seems to have come at last.
zh: 夏天似乎终于来了。

en: At last the rats came to the river.
zh: 老鼠们终于来到了河边。

en: At last, the baby fell asleep.
zh: 宝宝终于睡着了。

en: Eventually the salesman persuaded me to buy the expensive machine.
zh: 最终，推销员说服我购买了昂贵的机器。

en: It seems to have worn out.
zh: 它好像已经磨损了。

en: At last a good idea struck me.
zh: 我终于想到了一个好主意。

en: In the end, because of the disease, he became unable to walk and had to use a motorized wheelchair to get around.
zh: 最终，因为疾病，他变得无法行走，不得不使用电动轮椅出行。

en: Finally, she chose another kitten.
zh: 最终，她选择了另一只小猫。
